member.name: M:GroceryListHelper.Server.HelperMethods.JWTAuthenticationManager.Register(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Registers a new user. Checks first if there is already a user with the given email.
member.returns: Returns an error message if email is already in use, otherwise null.

member.name: M:GroceryListHelper.Server.HelperMethods.JWTAuthenticationManager.RefreshTokens(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a refresh JWT based on the previous refresh token claims. Checks that the previous refresh token has not expired and is otherwise valid.

member.name: P:GroceryListHelper.Server.Hubs.CartHubService.GroupAllowedEmails
member.summary: CartHub groups' allowed emails. Key is the host user id and value is the other allowed emails that can join (set by the host).
